amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that particulate pollution produced from mining activities is not defined as nuisance dust and remains subject to the Clean Air Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-317 to require that particulate pollution produced from mining activities is not defined as `nuisance dust' and thus remains subject to the Clean Air Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 257 (Roll no. 909).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 257 (Roll no. 909).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Waxman.
